    • Method Detail

      • delete

        static long delete(FSDirectory fsd,
          INodesInPath iip,
          INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo collectedBlocks,
          List<INode> removedINodes,
          long mtime)
            throws IOException
        Delete the target directory and collect the blocks under it
        Parameters:
        iip - the INodesInPath instance containing all the INodes for the path
        collectedBlocks - Blocks under the deleted directory
        removedINodes - INodes that should be removed from inodeMap
        Returns:
        the number of files that have been removed
        Throws:
        IOException

      • delete

        static INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo delete(FSNamesystem fsn,
                               String src,
                               boolean recursive,
                               boolean logRetryCache)
                                 throws IOException
        Remove a file/directory from the namespace.

        For large directories, deletion is incremental. The blocks under the directory are collected and deleted a small number at a time holding the FSNamesystem lock.

        For small directory or file the deletion is done in one shot.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteForEditLog

        static void deleteForEditLog(FSDirectory fsd,
                    String src,
                    long mtime)
                      throws IOException
        Delete a path from the name space Update the count at each ancestor directory with quota
        Note: This is to be used by FSEditLog only.
        Parameters:
        src - a string representation of a path to an inode
        mtime - the time the inode is removed
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteInternal

        static INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo deleteInternal(FSNamesystem fsn,
                                       String src,
                                       INodesInPath iip,
                                       boolean logRetryCache)
                                         throws IOException
        Remove a file/directory from the namespace.

        For large directories, deletion is incremental. The blocks under the directory are collected and deleted a small number at a time holding the FSNamesystem lock.

        For small directory or file the deletion is done in one shot.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • incrDeletedFileCount

        static void incrDeletedFileCount(long count)

      • deleteAllowed

        private static boolean deleteAllowed(INodesInPath iip,
                    String src)

      • unprotectedDelete

        private static long unprotectedDelete(FSDirectory fsd,
                     INodesInPath iip,
                     INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo collectedBlocks,
                     List<INode> removedINodes,
                     long mtime)
        Delete a path from the name space Update the count at each ancestor directory with quota
        Parameters:
        iip - the inodes resolved from the path
        collectedBlocks - blocks collected from the deleted path
        removedINodes - inodes that should be removed from inodeMap
        mtime - the time the inode is removed
        Returns:
        the number of inodes deleted; 0 if no inodes are deleted.
